definitions.text: the act of controlling by restraining someone or something
discipline in personal and social activities
examples: he was a model of polite restraint
she never lost control of herself

definitions.text: the state of being physically constrained
examples: dogs should be kept under restraint

definitions.text: a rule or condition that limits freedom

examples: the room was simply decorated with great restraint

definitions.text: a device that retards something's motion
examples: the car did not have proper restraints fitted
